description: Unique identifier for this attachment storage record; serves as the primary key.
Relative storage path or folder structure where related attachments are stored; likely used to build full file locations. Confirm exact scheme with SME.
Username or system process that created the record.
Date and time the record was created, in system timezone.
Username or system process that last updated the record.
Date and time of the most recent update.
Single-character status code indicating whether the record is active, inactive, or otherwise stateful; confirm allowed values and meanings with SME.
